reviewText: This tells the story of young musicians who were in love, and in love with their musical passions.  Hans did a marvelous job playing a young europeon lad from the time of childhood loved his fathers music and violin, though he never knew his father until later in adulthood, the joy turned to shame.  This is a true love story as well as a young girl tries to understand her past and her roots though overshadowed by vague memories of living in a german prison camp with her parents which she could barely remember, but an aquaintence helped her to fill in the chapters of her life she so longed to know. Hearts break, love and mend in this tale, truely a movie to see and keep in your collection!
